section.title: Steps in upgrading the bugzilla installation
section.p: Bugzilla exists on divvun.no, in the directory /Users/gtuit/Sites/bugzilla-3.4.4. Remember to include /opt/local/lib/mysql5/bin in $PATH when running the upgrade script.
Upgrade bugzilla according to these instructions: http://bugzilla.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installing/upgrading-with-git.html
